WorkItem.Description:
If I bind IsEditing to a property of my ViewModel, the TreeViewEx does not prevent several items to be "editing" at the same time.

If an item has its IsEditing property set to true, every other item should set it to false.
WorkItem.Summary: Several items can have IsEditing = true at the same time

Comments.Message:
Ok, IsEditing was never supposed to be set. I'm going to prevent that. The only way to start editing is press F2.

Is there a usecase you need it?

I want to be able to start edition from a contextual menu (right click > edit) and maybe from other commands. Also I might want to force to stay in edition mode if an invalid value is entered by forcing IsEditing to true.
